directions.0: Brown ground beef in a saucepan, drain excess liquids
directions.1: Add Manwich sauce to pan, place on medium heat until it starts to bubble
directions.2: Serve on buns, allow to cool before eating
directions.3: Leftovers can be frozen in an airtight container for up to 3 months.
